title: Why learn a language?
creator_credit: John Tatoulis, Colin South and Media World
brief_description: A light hearted look at the benefits of learning a language other than English and the misconceptions some people have about the difficulties they might encounter in doing so. The program was funded by the Ministerial Advisory Committee on Multicultural and Migrant Education.
